title: Trying to reconnect..., Failed to save mastery pages due to network failure
body:
Hi guys,

I was away since 2014, but a friend made me come back!

Unfortunately, I can't even set my masteries, because the client keeps trying to reconnect or relog me and won't save anything I do. What's up with that?

My network is fine, I can play other games like PUBG, DOTA2 and Offworld trading company just fine. League of legends just keeps bugging apparently.

I've already done :
-- a speed-test. (it's ok)
-- repair the client (seems ok)
-- Performed Hextech Repair Tool, fresh install (finished)

if you have any clues on what's happening, I'm all ears.

Thanks

replies.body: Hmmmmmm so it's only disconnecting you whenever you hit that save button for your masteries? Strange....this might actually be kind of weird packet loss or ping spike issue, so let's be sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just as a precaution. After doing that if it's still happening, hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can dive a little deeper.
